titles: The Declaration of the Gentry of the county of Kent, who have adhered to the King, and suffered imprisonment or sequestration during the late troubles.
publisher: Printed for Gabriel Bedell, and are to be sold at the Middle-Temple-gate in Fleetstreet,
notes: Signed: Col. Richard Spencer, Esquire [and 29 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
